meanings.definition: An arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place.
meanings.sent1: I have an appointment with the dentist tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She scheduled an appointment to see her doctor next week.
meanings.sent3: The appointment with the hairdresser made her hair look fabulous.
meanings.sent4: His appointment with destiny was finally fulfilled.
meanings.sent5: Missing the appointment caused a lot of inconvenience.

meanings.definition: The act of appointing or assigning someone to a particular position or role.
meanings.sent1: The appointment of a new manager brought positive changes.
meanings.sent2: The appointment of committee members was well-received.
meanings.sent3: His appointment as team captain surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The appointment of the CEO marked a new era for the company.
meanings.sent5: The appointment of a referee ensured fair play in the game.
